ðŸ“– Summary: RapidRAW is a GPU-accelerated RAW image editor designed for photographers seeking a fast and intuitive editing experience. It offers non-destructive editing, masking capabilities, and a lightweight cross-platform package. While not focused on perfect color accuracy, it prioritizes a fluid creative process with features like auto adjustments, library filters, and batch exporting.
